replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
1.Better Questing本体是靠快捷键打开任务的，任务书是附属Better Questing - Quest Book提供
https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... questing-quest-book
2.什么意思？

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
本体 Better Questing
https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... uesting-3.5.329.jar
任务拓展 Better Questing - Standard Expansion
https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... pansion-3.4.173.jar
任务书 Better Questing - Quest Book
https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... book-3.1.1-1.12.jar
rf支持 Better Questing - RF Expansion
https://media.forgecdn.net/files/2787/287/RFExpansion-3.4.31.jar
自定义npc支持 Better Questing - NPC Integration
https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... egration-3.4.34.jar
多方块机构支持 Better Questing - Multiblock and Structure Integration
https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... tegration-1.0.6.jar

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
masai123 发表于 2020-8-1 18:01
这些是全家才有用处吗？
主要就是本体+任务拓展Standard Expansion+任务书Quest Book，其他可用用不大，用不到就不加，上次我说错了加了任务拓展Standard Expansion提供快捷键打卡任务书
